== Pottore (CT) (627834) ==

Pottore (CT) is a town in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 4.64 sq. km. and harbouring 1937 households with total population of 7848 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 6 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 297 km. Male population is 3837 and female population is 4011. Scheduled Caste population is 777 and Scheduled Tribes population is 4. Census Location Code of the town is 627834<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 6 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 85 km. Railway station is at Thrissur at a distance of 7 km.
